title: Goodipuse
description: What animal sounds like a goose in the morning, looks like a goose at noon, and tastes like a goose at night?

classical/caesar.title: Caesar
classical/caesar.description: Caesar cipher is a substitution cipher where each letter in the plaintext is shifted a certain number of places down the alphabet.

base64/image.title: Base64 Image
base64/image.description: Base64 is a group of similar binary-to-text encoding schemes that represent binary data in an ASCII string format by translating it into a radix-64 representation.
